title: BIMSTEC Secretary-General arrives in Sri Lanka
body_lines: Secretary-General of Bay of Bengal Initiative for Multi-Sectoral Technical and Economic Cooperation (BIMSTEC) Tenzin Lekphell arrived in Sri Lanka this afternoon (March 26).
Mr. Lekphell will be attending the 5th BIMSTEC Summit scheduled to be held in Colombo on Wednesday (March 30).
